objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has executed the PowerShell command `Get-EventLog security -instanceid 4624` to identify associated user and computer account names.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE SILHOUETTE May 2023)
